name: Quicken Financial Life for Mac File
summary: Learn about .LHR files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: With Intuit's acquisition of Mint.com, development for Quicken Financial Life for Mac was discontinued. However, in 2010, Intuit released a follow-on product named Quicken Essentials for Mac.

description: Data file created by Quicken Financial Life for Mac, a personal money management program that never reached a version beyond beta; stored financial data for the user but was not compatible with the Quicken Windows software or other versions of the Quicken software.
